root.name: Shadow: War of Succession
root.description: OverviewThe king pin of the worlds largest criminal organization, S.H.A.D.O.W is dead. You play as one of the seven fighters in a tournament, whose winner will be chosen as the new leader of S.H.A.D.O.W.CharactersAnvil StilesSasha RomanoffGabrielle St. JohnViperCarlos CortezRiggs RiddickErika Storm
